Text.Page:
The argons were doing some sort of botanical research here. We don't know what they were working on, but we do know one thing: they were big.

We've also found some flask-like containers. Bring me whatever's inside them, but watch out for big argons.

These contents confirm that the argons were doing botanical research here.

If I can duplicate their methodology, perhaps we can figure out what the argons were trying to do.
Next stop for you: the Hexheart chamber. Talk to Beranie.
The argonomorph kulkaris are going to try to stop you. They're obviously far deadlier than ordinary kulkaris, but don't give up! Get those plant samples!
You came here at {@Creature:246#1024$$Platanok}'s request? I'm surprised he has soldiers to spare. Nevertheless, I can use your help.
